# Uploading the Mr. Trashwheel Dataset

Packages upload.
```{r setup}
library(readxl)
library(tidyverse)
```

Data upload and cleaning for trash data.
```{r trashwheel upload}
trashwheel_df = 
  drop_na(
    janitor::clean_names(
          read_excel("trashwheels.xlsx", sheet = 1, col_names = TRUE, range = "A2:N534")
         )) %>%
  mutate(sports_balls = round(sports_balls, digits = 0))
trashwheel_df
```
